document_data.name: Borlann
document_data.History: He was the last lover of the [[Thayan]] [[elf]] [[Dahlia Sin'felle]] but in that year Dahlia decided to terminate their relationship, and as always, she killed Borlann after the separation.
document_data.Possessions: Borlann was the grandson of [[Kensidan]] and possessed his ''[[Cloak of the Crow]]'', a magic cape that could polymorph a person into a giant crow, which was later taken by Dahlia.
